content: {A打招呼}<style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, c'mere, c'mere~! I've got somethin' nice to share with you.
info: 作物庄园-云果_主流程文本3

content: {A害羞冒烟}<style=SizeSmall>I sure do hope we can grow sproutsiess together someday...</style> D-Do you like it mah? Growin' 'em ain't all that tough.
info: 奇特作物庄园-云果_主流程文本3

content: You just gotta water 'em each day, and with both giant crops and mutated ones growin' close by, there's a chance you might grow some <style=Highlight>bizarre crops</style>.
info: 奇特作物庄园-云果_主流程文本3

content: Remember what I told ya yesterday? Well, here it is — a <style=Highlight>Bizarre Snowy Cantaloupe</style>! I actually managed to grow it. It's a mighty purty one, don't ya think?
info: 奇特作物庄园-云果_主流程文本3

content: I sure hope you harvest somethin' real special! {A灵光一现}And then... we could use this <style=Highlight>Blueprint: Bizarre Crop Harvest Fair</style> to hold the most bizarre crop fair ever.
